article: Martin was a good man. He had a small  shop  in the town. Only Sam and Henry  _  for him. One day three of them went to the city to buy things for the shop. On the way they  _  a genie . The genie said, "I can make everyone's wish come true.  _  you tell me your wishes?" Three of them said OK. Sam went first. "I'd like to  _  the rest of my life living in a big house in St. Thomas  _  any worries." The genie said "OK" and sent him to ST. Thomas. Henry went  _  ."I'd like to live a life  _  on a ship in the Mediterranean because travelling on it will be great fun." The genie said "OK" and made him get there at once. Finally, it was Martin's turn. "And what is your  _  ?" asked the genie. "I want them  _  back," answered Martin. Then the genie said "OK" and Sam and Henry stood in front of them again.
